subject: p12410066
History: Left pneumonectomy, evaluate for lung expansion. CHEST, SINGLE AP PORTABLE VIEW. Patient is status post left pneumonectomy. There is expected lucent left hemithorax and slight leftward shift of the cardiomediastinal silhouette and right lung hyperinflation. Cardiomediastinal silhouette itself is stable, with borderline cardiomegaly. In the right lung, no CHF, focal infiltrate, or effusion. Left-sided chest tube now present. Curvilinear density over the left mid thoracic spine appears to represent a spinal epidural catheter terminating at the level of T7 for which clinical correlation is requested.
Impression: Expected left lung hyperlucency and volume loss. Slightly elevated left hemidiaphragm.
